carpet.rule.hopperShulkerStacking.name: Hopper Shulker Box Stacking
carpet.rule.hopperShulkerStacking.desc: Controls whenever hopper transfers should stack shulkers in containers.
carpet.rule.clientShulkerSync.name: Sync Stacked Shulker Count
carpet.rule.clientShulkerSync.desc: Fixes displayed shulker amount on vanilla clients. See issue #1899 in Carpet's repo.
Makes hoppers pick up single shulkers from a stack entity.
carpet.rule.minecartCollectSingleShulker: Makes hopper minecarts pick up single shulkers from a stack entity.
Disables additional slowdown caused by overstacked shulker boxes when set to false.
carpet.rule.legacyShulkerItemMerging.des: Enables the shulker box item merging logic Carpet used prior to the 1.20.5 update.
